title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU, Euratom)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Investigations
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Investigations 
Conducted by the European Anti-Fraud Office (OLAF)) (Competent Authority) 
Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (investigations conducted european anti-fraud office (olaf)) (competent authority) regulation 2025

title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU, Euratom)
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations – 

“FIU Ireland” has the same meaning as it has in Part 4 of the Criminal Justice 
(Money Laundering and Terrorist Financing) Act 2010 (No. 6 of 2010); 

“Regulation (EU, Euratom) No 883/2013” means Regulation (EU, Euratom) No 
883/2013 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 September 20131 
concerning investigations conducted by the European Anti-Fraud Office 
(OLAF) and repealing Regulation (EC) No 1073/1999 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council and Council Regulation (Euratom) No 1074/1999, 
as last amended by Regulation (EU, Euratom) 2020/2223 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 23 December 20202. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in these Regulations and that is also 
used in Regulation (EU, Euratom) No 883/2013 has, unless the context 
otherwise requires, the same meaning in these Regulations as it has in Regulation 
(EU, Euratom) No 883/2013.

title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU, Euratom)
heading: 3. FIU Ireland shall be the relevant competent authority in the State for the
text_raw:
3. FIU Ireland shall be the relevant competent authority in the State for the 
purposes of points (a) and (b) of the first subparagraph of Article 7(3a) of 
Regulation (EU, Euratom) No 883/2013. 

1 OJ No. L 248, 18.9.2013, p.1. 
2 OJ No. L 437, 28.12.2020, p.49. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [349] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 July, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance.
